title: Guided Meditation For Positive Vibrations | Gurudev
description:
Meditations By Gurudev is the Art Of Living's official YouTube channel for all meditations by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar. 

Gurudev has made meditation simple, easy and accessible to all! He has improved the emotional, mental and physical health of millions across the globe through his meditations

If you're looking for a stress free, anxiety free, worry free life, then this channel is for you! All you need to do is sit back, relax and follow Gurudev's instructions!

Are you interested to learn meditation? Let us know by sharing your details on the link below, we will get back to you with details : https://aoliv.in/interested-meditation





About #Gurudev - 
World-renowned humanitarian, spiritual leader, and an ambassador of peace and human values. Through his life and work, Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar has inspired millions around the world with a vision of a stress-free and violence-free world. Gurudev founded The Art of Living, a non-profit organization that is engaged in stress-management and service initiatives across the world.

Learn Sudarshan Kriya the world's most powerful breathing technique: https://aoliv.in/learnsudarshankriya

Do Like, Comment, Share & Subscribe to the channel!

Subscribe to Gurudev's Channel: 
https://youtube.com/srisri

To stay connected with Gurudev's wisdom, meditations, books, music and more, download The Art of Living App: aoliv.in/aolapp 

🎧Listen to Gurudev on Spotify:
Talks - https://open.spotify.com/show/75Wx1Zy...
Meditations - https://open.spotify.com/show/6INVWvh...

ॐ श्री गुरु ब्रह्मा गुरु विष्णु गुरु र देवो महेश्वर,
गुरु साक्षात् परब्रह्म तस्मै श्री गुरुवे नमः 🙏
ॐ ध्यान मुलं गुरु र मुर्ति
पुजां मुलं गुरु र पदं
मंत्र मुलं गुरु र वाक्यं
मोक्ष मुलं गुरु र कृपा।
Each day l undergo the "Guru Magic". Today all the while l was smiling,a big bright smile. Gurudev,pranams on your Lotus feet.
Me dhanyavaad ho rahi hu gurudev aapki sharan me aaker aap mer sabhi sanshayon ko door kar rahe ho dhanyavaad gurudev kritagya hu anant tak dandwat parinaam aapke shree charno me🙏🏻🌹
jgd🌹🎋🌹 meditation for positive thinking is a wonderful perception of our outer world...Gurudev is the master of this practice...thank you..
